SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class PlayerBean

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.PlayerBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerBean extends Object implements Serializable
This class is a bean used to store the player state and the player resources, hand and achievements. It collects the information about the player sent by the server and, it is used by the client to update the UI.
See Also:
